## otto chat

Ask ChatGPT a question from the command line.

### Synopsis

Ask ChatGPT a question from the command line.

If '-q' is not specified, the user will be prompted to enter a question.
	

```
otto chat [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help              help for chat
  -q, --question string   Question to chat ChatGPT
```
